mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_tbl ( name , content , viewQty , likeQty , createDt , createId , deleteFlag) VALUES ( #{name} , #{content} , 0 , 0 , #{createDt} , #{createId} , false)
mapper.select: SELECT id , name , content , viewQty , likeQty , createDt , createId , updateDt , updateId , deleteDt , deleteId , deleteFlag FROM board_tbl WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
mapper.update: UPDATE board_tbl SET viewQty = viewQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
UPDATE board_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
UPDATE board_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board_tbl WHERE name like CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') AND deleteFlag = false

SELECT id , name , content , viewQty , likeQty , createDt , createId , updateDt , updateId , deleteDt , deleteId , deleteFlag FROM board_tbl WHERE name like CONCAT('%',#{searchName},'%') AND deleteFlag = false ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
